Articles.Content:
Hi, I haven't really posted around here sense the forum crash thing.

I was looking to find a mod I think I saw a while back in the spaceport but can now no longer find. Or at least something that can do the same thing. It was a mod that could cause parts to fail, or rather blow up, on command. For the life of me I can't find the name of it. I was going to use it for some cinematic stuff. I have spent about an hour trying to find it, so I may just be crazy and think I saw this mod and am making it up... If that's the case, woops, sorry to waste time, but I do think it was there, haha.

If anyone can help thanks, if not, well thanks for looking at my help request thread anyway =D
If it does not exist it may be fairly easy to code. just the code to notice right clicking on a part, setting a timer and BOOM!

The TAC self destruct mod adds a part that can:

A) Explode on command.

Explode the entire rocket.

Oh right on. Thank you astropapi1, that is the mod I had seen and was looking for.

For anyone else seeing this thread, the mod spaceport link is here.
